FRANCI4.original: There is ~g~ammo~s~ for the sniper rifle in the car.
FRANCI4.translated: 车里有狙击步枪的~g~弹药。

FRANCI4.original: To access the keypad press ~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~ from the initial cellphone screen.
FRANCI4.translated: 在主屏幕按~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~调出拨号盘。

FRANCI4.original: Navigate the mobile keypad using ~PAD_DPAD_ALL~. Select your desired input using ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~. To make a phone call select the phone icon on the top left of the keypad.
FRANCI4.translated: 用~PAD_DPAD_ALL~选择键盘上的数字，按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~输入所选数字。选中键盘左上角的电话图标呼出。

FRANCI4.original: Take the ~g~sniper rifle~s~ from the car.
To dial a number with your phone you will need to access the phone. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~ to activate the phone.
FRANCI4.translated: 要用号码呼叫，你需要拿出手机。按~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~拿出手机。

FRANCI4.original: Go to a gun shop and obtain a sniper rifle.
FRANCI4.translated: 去枪店买一把狙击步枪。
去弄一些狙击枪的~g~子弹。

FRANCI4.original: Get the sniper rifle from the ~g~car.
Go to the gun shop and obtain ammo for the sniper rifle.
FRANCI4.translated: 去枪店购买狙击步枪子弹。

FRANCI4.original: ~s~Lure the ~r~dealer~s~ into the open and take him out.
FRANCI4.translated: ~s~诱导目标~r~毒贩~s~进入视线范围，干掉他。

FRANCI4.original: Get ammo for your sniper rifle from the ~g~car.
FRANCI4.translated: 去~g~车~s~里拿取狙击枪弹药。

FRANCI4.original: Make your way to the dealer's apartment off ~y~Denver Avenue.
FRANCI4.translated: 前往毒贩所在的~y~Denver大道~s~上的公寓。
